fixation_duration_ms.description: How long fixation scene is shown, milliseconds.

number_of_shapes_shown.description: How many shapes to show on the grid at one time.

number_of_shapes_changing_color.description: If a different color trial, how many shapes should change color (minimum is 2, because changes are swaps with other shapes).

shapes_presented_duration_ms.description: How long the shapes are shown, milliseconds.

shapes_removed_duration_ms.description: How long to show a blank square after shapes are removed, milliseconds.

cells_per_side.description: How many cell positions for each side of the square grid (e.g., 3 is a 3x3 grid; 4 is a 4x4 grid).

number_of_different_colors_trials.description: Number of trials where the shapes have different colors.

show_trials_complete_scene.description: After the final trial, should a completion scene be shown? Otherwise, the game will immediately end.

instruction_type.description: Type of instructions to show, 'short' or 'long'.

instructions.description: When non-null, an InstructionsOptions object that will completely override the built-in instructions.

show_quit_button.description: Should the activity quit button be shown?

show_locale_picker.description: Should the icon that allows the participant to switch the locale be shown?

seed.description: Optional seed for the seeded pseudo-random number generator. When null, the default Math.random() is used.

scoring.description: Should scoring data be generated? Default is false.

study_id.description: The short human-readable text ID of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

study_uuid.description: Unique identifier of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

document_uuid.description: Unique identifier for this data document.

session_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all activities in this administration of the session. This identifier changes each time a new session starts.

activity_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all trials in this administration of the activity. This identifier changes each time the activity starts.

activity_publish_uuid.description: Persistent unique identifier of the activity. This identifier never changes. It can be used to identify the activity across different studies and sessions.

device_timezone.description: Timezone of the device. Calculated from Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone.

device_timezone_offset_minutes.description: Difference in minutes between UTC and device timezone. Calculated from Date.getTimezoneOffset().

locale.description: Locale of the trial. null if the activity does not support localization.

activity_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the game activity.

trial_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the trial. Null if trial was skipped.

trial_end_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the end of the trial (when user presses 'Same' or 'Different'). Null if trial was skipped.

trial_index.description: Index of the trial within this assessment, 0-based.

present_shapes.description: Configuration of shapes shown to the user in the presentation phase. Null if trial was skipped.

shape_index.description: Index of the shape within the library of shapes, 0-based

response_shapes.description: Configuration of shapes shown to the user in the response phase. Null if trial was skipped.

shape_index.description: Index of the shape within the library of shapes, 0-based

response_time_duration_ms.description: Milliseconds from when the response configuration of shapes is shown until the user taps a response. Null if trial was skipped.

user_response.description: User's response to whether the shapes are same colors or different.

study_id.description: The short human-readable text ID of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

study_uuid.description: Unique identifier of the study (protocol, experiment, or other aggregate) that contains the administration of this activity.

document_uuid.description: Unique identifier for this data document.

session_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all activities in this administration of the session. This identifier changes each time a new session starts.

activity_uuid.description: Unique identifier for all trials in this administration of the activity. This identifier changes each time the activity starts.

activity_publish_uuid.description: Persistent unique identifier of the activity. This identifier never changes. It can be used to identify the activity across different studies and sessions.

device_timezone.description: Timezone of the device. Calculated from Intl.DateTimeFormat().resolvedOptions().timeZone.

device_timezone_offset_minutes.description: Difference in minutes between UTC and device timezone. Calculated from Date.getTimezoneOffset().

locale.description: Locale of the trial. null if the activity does not support localization.

activity_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the game activity.

first_trial_begin_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the beginning of the first trial. Null if no trials were completed.

last_trial_end_iso8601_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp at the end of the last trial. Null if no trials were completed.

flag_trials_match_expected.description: Does the number of completed and expected trials match? 1 = true, 0 = false.

participant_score.description: Participant-facing score, calculated as (number of correct trials / number of trials attempted) * 100. This is a simple metric to provide feedback to the participant. Null if no trials attempted.
